channel.title: hardware on SysCtl
channel.description: Recent content in hardware on SysCtl

item.title: Huawei 2200 v3 default ip addresses and password
item.description: Today I tested new storage system: Huawei OceanStor 2200 V3. And I really liked this system.

item.title: Huawei OceanStor MIB
item.description: If you need MIB files for Huawei OceanStor go to Support > Bulletins > Service Bulletins > MIB Files > IT on Huawei site.
